resources.string: Established in 1996, G H Raisoni College of Engineering [GHRCE] is a premier Autonomous institution in the central India imparting a holistic technical education to the students residing not only in India but also international students. The institution has always been ranked amongst a well performing institution by National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) 2017, MHRD, Government of India. Currently GHRCE Positioned in the Band of 51-100 in Innovation Category by NIRF Ranking 2023. The institution has also been ranked prominently by India Today MDRA Survey and Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements [ARIIA].

I am a student currently pursuing Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering from G.H Raisoni College of Engineering, Nagpur (Affilated to RTMNU). I\'m a Tech enthusiast with an aspiration to build things. I currently work with native Android App Development with Java and Kotlin. I also have some experience with C++, HTML/CSS and Python. I love developing products and research UX Development. Apart from programing I have good experience in working with Arduino and other IoT devices.

College Application is a game-changer for G H Raisoni students, offering a sleek Material UI for easy navigation. With note-taking, past papers, and the latest news, it\'s like having a personalized university website in my pocketâ€”essential for staying connected to campus life!

College Application is my go-to for all things G H Raisoni. The app\'s user-friendly interface and access to university info make it a handy assistant. Seamless communication with authorities and quick access to results add significant value for students and parents alike
Confirm New Password cannot be empty
The Quiz will contain 5 randomized questions.
Every correct answer scores you 5 points.
Every wrong answer deduct you 2 points.
Your results will be saved and will be accumulated in your history.

Q. How will I be benefiting from this Internship program?

 A. You will get industrial experience and knowledge on respective domain along with Resume building, and LinkedIn Account building Skills.

 Perks you will receive :
 - Offer Letter from Cognifyz Technologies
 - Internship Certificate
 - Resume Building Support
 - Letter of recommendation based on Performance
 - After clearing interview stipend ranging from 5K - 10K

 Terms and Conditions :

 For the interview process:
 Successfully completing the first month of the internship is a prerequisite for eligibility.
 The interview process will be conducted after the completion of the internship.
 If you pass the interview, you will be eligible for a performance-based stipend ranging from 10,000 to 15,000 rupees.
 The stipend amount will reflect your performance and contribution during the internship.
 To participate in the interview process, there is a registration cost of 249/-. 

 For opting out of the interview process:
 If you choose not to participate in the interview process, you have the option to pay 149/-. Paying this fee will grant you an Internship Completion Letter. These letters will confirm the successful completion of your internship and provide a recommendation for future opportunities.

 Please fill all the required fields carefully, information provided will be used in offer letter and Completion Certificate.

 Note: Please do not spam (apply multiple times for same domain), in this case your application will be considered as invalid.

 For more detail contact on
 Email ID : cognifyztechnologies@gmail.com
 Telegram : https://t.me/cognifyz_technologies
 LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/company/cognifyz-techonologies.

1. To apply for the interview process, there will be a registration cost of 249/-. (This fee covers the administrative expenses associated with the interview process and Documentation cost of the Internship Completion Letter and Recommendation letter ensuring a fair and structured evaluation of candidates.)

 2. Pay 149 /- Only for Documentation Costs. (This fee covers the administrative expenses associated with the Documentation cost of the Internship Completion Letter ensuring a fair and structured evaluation of candidates.)


Note: You can choose any one option from above
Yes, I agree to pay the registration cost of INR 249/- for the interview process.
Yes, I agree to pay the processing fee of INR 149/- Only for the Documentation Cost.

Q. What is this?
 A. This is a 4 Week Virtual Internship Program opportunity from CodSoft.

 Please fill all the required fields carefully, information provided will be used in offer letter and Completion Certificate.
